trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Copy-Item
trans-unit.target: Copy-Item

trans-unit.source: Copy-Item
trans-unit.target: Copy-Item

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Copies an item from one location to another.
trans-unit.target: 将项从一个位置复制到另一个位置。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: Path (Default)
trans-unit.target: 路径 （默认值）

trans-unit.source: LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Copy-Item** cmdlet copies an item from one location to another location in the same namespace.
trans-unit.target: **Copy-item** cmdlet 将项从一个位置复制到同一命名空间中的另一个位置。

trans-unit.source: For instance, it can copy a file to a folder, but it cannot copy a file to a certificate drive.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它可以将文件复制到文件夹，但它不能将文件复制到证书驱动器。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not cut or delete the items being copied.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 不剪切或删除所复制的项。

trans-unit.source: The particular items that the cmdlet can copy depend on the Windows PowerShell provider that exposes the item.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 可复制的特定项取决于公开该项的 Windows PowerShell 提供程序。

trans-unit.source: For instance, it can copy files and directories in a file system drive and registry keys and entries in the registry drive.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它可以在文件系统驱动器和注册表项和注册表驱动器中的条目中复制文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet can copy and rename items in the same command.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 可以复制和重命名同一命令中的项。

trans-unit.source: To rename an item, enter the new name in the value of the *Destination* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要重命名某个项，输入新名称的值中 *目标* 参数。

trans-unit.source: To rename an item and not copy it, use the Rename-Item cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要重命名某个项并不想复制该列，使用 Rename-item cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Copy a file to the specified directory
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 将文件复制到指定的目录

trans-unit.source: This command copies the mar1604.log.txt file to the C:\Presentation directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将 mar1604.log.txt 文件复制到 C:\Presentation 目录下。

trans-unit.source: The command does not delete the original file.
trans-unit.target: 此命令不会删除原始文件。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Copy the contents of a directory to another directory
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 将目录内容复制到另一个目录

trans-unit.source: This command copies the entire contents of the Logfiles directory into the Drawings directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将 Logfiles 目录的完整内容复制到 Drawings 目录中。

trans-unit.source: If the LogFiles directory contains files in subdirectories, those subdirectories will be copied with their file trees intact.
trans-unit.target: 如果 LogFiles 目录的子目录中包含文件，则会复制这些子目录，并保留其文件树。

trans-unit.source: The *Container* parameter is set to true by default.
trans-unit.target: *容器* 参数设置为默认情况下，则返回 true。

trans-unit.source: This preserves the directory structure.
trans-unit.target: 这样将保留目录结构。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Copy the contents of a directory to another directory and create the destination directory if it does not exist
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 将目录内容复制到另一个目录并创建目标目录，如果它尚不存在

trans-unit.source: This command copies the contents of the C:\Logfiles directory to the C:\Drawings\Logs directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将 C:\Logfiles 目录的内容复制到 C:\Drawings\Logs 目录中。

trans-unit.source: It creates the \Logs subdirectory if it does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果子目录 \Logs 不存在，则此命令将创建该子目录。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Copy a file to the specified directory and rename the file
trans-unit.target: 示例 4︰ 将文件复制到指定的目录和重命名文件

trans-unit.source: This command uses the **Copy-Item** cmdlet to copy the Get-Widget.ps1 script from the \\\\Server01\Share directory to the \\\\Server12\ScriptArchive directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用 **Copy-item** cmdlet 将 get-widget.ps1 脚本从复制 \\\\Server01\Share 目录更改为 \\\\Server12\ScriptArchive 目录。

trans-unit.source: As part of the copy operation, the command also changes the item name from Get-Widget.ps1 to Get-Widget.ps1.txt, so it can be attached to email messages.
trans-unit.target: 作为复制操作的一部分，该命令还会将项名称从 Get-Widget.ps1 更改为 Get-Widget.ps1.txt，以便可以将其附加到电子邮件消息中。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Copy a file to a remote computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 5︰ 将文件复制到远程计算机

trans-unit.source: The first command creates a session to the remote computer named Server01 with the credential of Contoso\PattiFul and stores the results in the variable named $Session.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令创建与 Contoso\PattiFul 凭据为名为 Server01 远程计算机的会话，并将结果存储在名为 $Session 变量中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the **Copy-Item** cmdlet to copy test.log from the D:\Folder001 folder to the C:\Folder001_Copy folder on the remote computer using the session information stored in the $Session variable.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 **Copy-item** cmdlet 将 test.log 文件从 D:\Folder001 文件夹复制到使用 $Session 变量中存储的会话信息的远程计算机上的 C:\Folder001_Copy 文件夹。

trans-unit.source: This command does not delete the original file.
trans-unit.target: 此命令不会删除原始文件。

trans-unit.source: Example 6: Copy the entire contents of a folder to a remote computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 6︰ 将一个文件夹的全部内容复制到远程计算机

trans-unit.source: The first command creates a session to the remote computer named Server01 with the credential of Contoso\PattiFul and stores the results in the variable named $Session.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令创建与 Contoso\PattiFul 凭据为名为 Server01 远程计算机的会话，并将结果存储在名为 $Session 变量中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the **Copy-Item** cmdlet to copy the entire contents from the D:\Folder002 folder to the C:\Folder002_Copy directory on the remote computer using the session information stored in the $Session variable.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 **Copy-item** cmdlet 将从 D:\Folder002 文件夹的全部内容复制到使用 $Session 变量中存储的会话信息的远程计算机上的 C:\Folder002_Copy 目录。

trans-unit.source: The subfolders will be copied with their file trees intact.
trans-unit.target: 将保留其文件树与复制子文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Example 7: Recursively copy the entire contents of a folder to a remote computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 7︰ 则以递归方式会将一个文件夹的全部内容复制到远程计算机

trans-unit.source: The first command creates a session to the remote computer named Server01 with the credential of Contoso\PattiFul and stores the results in the variable named $Session.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令创建与 Contoso\PattiFul 凭据为名为 Server01 远程计算机的会话，并将结果存储在名为 $Session 变量中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the **Copy-Item** cmdlet to copy the entire contents from the D:\Folder003 folder to the C:\Folder003_Copy directory on the remote computer using the session information stored in the $Session variable.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 **Copy-item** cmdlet 将从 D:\Folder003 文件夹的全部内容复制到使用 $Session 变量中存储的会话信息的远程计算机上的 C:\Folder003_Copy 目录。

trans-unit.source: The subfolders will be copied with their file trees intact.
trans-unit.target: 将保留其文件树与复制子文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Since this command uses the *Recurse* parameter, the operation will create the Folder003_Copy folder if it does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 由于此命令使用 *Recurse* 参数，如果不存在，该操作将创建 Folder003_Copy 文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Example 8: Copy a file to a remote computer and then rename the file
trans-unit.target: 示例 8︰ 将文件复制到远程计算机，然后重命名文件

trans-unit.source: The first command creates a session to the remote computer named Server01 with the credential of Contoso\PattiFul and stores the results in the variable named $Session.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令创建与 Contoso\PattiFul 凭据为名为 Server01 远程计算机的会话，并将结果存储在名为 $Session 变量中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the **Copy-Item** cmdlet to copy scriptingexample.ps1 from the D:\Folder004 folder to the C:\Folder004_Copy folder on the remote computer using the session information stored in the $Session variable.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 **Copy-item** cmdlet 将 scriptingexample.ps1 D:\Folder004 文件夹中复制到使用 $Session 变量中存储的会话信息的远程计算机上的 C:\Folder004_Copy 文件夹。

trans-unit.source: As part of the copy operation, the command also changes the item name from scriptingexample.ps1 to scriptingexample_copy.ps1, so it can be attached to email messages.
trans-unit.target: 作为复制操作的一部分，该命令还更改项名称从 scriptingexample.ps1 为 scriptingexample_copy.ps1，因此可以附加到电子邮件消息。

trans-unit.source: This command does not delete the original file.
trans-unit.target: 此命令不会删除原始文件。

trans-unit.source: Example 9: Copy a remote file to the local computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 9︰ 将远程文件复制到本地计算机

trans-unit.source: The first command creates a session to the remote computer named Server01 with the credential of Contoso\PattiFul and stores the results in the variable named $Session.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令创建与 Contoso\PattiFul 凭据为名为 Server01 远程计算机的会话，并将结果存储在名为 $Session 变量中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the **Copy-Item** cmdlet to copy test.log from the remote C:\MyRemoteData\ to the local D:\MyLocalData folder using the session information stored in the $Session variable.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 **Copy-item** cmdlet 将从远程 C:\MyRemoteData\ test.log 文件复制到本地 D:\MyLocalData 文件夹使用 $Session 变量中存储的会话信息。

trans-unit.source: This command does not delete the original file.
trans-unit.target: 此命令不会删除原始文件。

trans-unit.source: Example 10: Copy the entire contents of a remote folder to the local computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 10︰ 将远程文件夹的全部内容复制到本地计算机

trans-unit.source: The first command creates a session to the remote computer named Server01 with the credential of Contoso\PattiFul and stores the results in the variable named $Session.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令创建与 Contoso\PattiFul 凭据为名为 Server01 远程计算机的会话，并将结果存储在名为 $Session 变量中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the **Copy-Item** cmdlet to copy the entire contents from the remote C:\MyRemoteData\scripts folder to the local D:\MyLocalData folder using the session information stored in the $Session variable.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 **Copy-item** cmdlet 来从远程 C:\MyRemoteData\scripts 文件夹的全部内容复制到本地 D:\MyLocalData 文件夹使用 $Session 变量中存储的会话信息。

trans-unit.source: If the scripts folder contains files in subfolders, those subfolders will be copied with their file trees intact.
trans-unit.target: 如果脚本文件夹包含子文件夹中的文件，这些子文件夹将复制其文件树保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Example 11: Recursively copy the entire contents of a remote folder to the local computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 11︰ 以递归方式复制远程文件夹的全部内容到本地计算机

trans-unit.source: The first command creates a session to the remote computer named Server01 with the credential of Contoso\PattiFul and stores the results in the variable named $Session.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令创建与 Contoso\PattiFul 凭据为名为 Server01 远程计算机的会话，并将结果存储在名为 $Session 变量中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the **Copy-Item** cmdlet to copy the entire contents from the remote C:\MyRemoteData\scripts folder to the local D:\MyLocalData\scripts folder using the session information stored in the $Session variable.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 **Copy-item** cmdlet 来从远程 C:\MyRemoteData\scripts 文件夹的全部内容复制到本地 D:\MyLocalData\scripts 文件夹使用 $Session 变量中存储的会话信息。

trans-unit.source: Since this command uses the *Recurse* parameter, the operation will create the scripts folder if it does not already exist .If the scripts folder contains files in subfolders, those subfolders will be copied with their file trees intact.
trans-unit.target: 由于此命令使用 *Recurse* 参数，如果不存在，该操作将创建脚本文件夹。如果脚本文件夹包含子文件夹中的文件，这些子文件夹将复制其文件树保持不变。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -Container
trans-unit.target: 容器

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet preserves container objects during the copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 指示此 cmdlet 将在复制操作期间保留容器对象。

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定有权执行此操作的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 默认为当前用户。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as User01 or Domain01\User01, or enter a **PSCredential** object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 键入用户名，例如 User01 或 Domain01\User01，或输入 **PSCredential** 对象，例如由 Get-credential cmdlet 生成。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, you will be prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果键入用户名，则将提示你输入密码。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not supported by any providers installed with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 随同 Windows PowerShell 一起安装的任何提供程序都不支持此参数。

trans-unit.source: -Destination
trans-unit.target: -目标

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the new location.
trans-unit.target: 指定新位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: To rename a copied item, include the new name in the value.
trans-unit.target: 若要重命名复制的项，则将新名称包含在该值中。

trans-unit.source: -Exclude
trans-unit.target: -排除

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, an item or items that this cmdlet excludes from the operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定作为一个字符串数组，此 cmdlet 将从该操作中排除的项或项。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: -Filter
trans-unit.target: 筛选器

trans-unit.source: Specifies a filter in the provider's format or language.
trans-unit.target: 以提供程序的格式或语言指定筛选器。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的值限定 *路径* 参数。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the filter, including the use of wildcards, depends on the provider.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器的语法（包括通配符的使用）取决于提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Filters are more efficient than other parameters, because the provider applies them when the cmdlet gets the objects, rather than have Windows PowerShell filter the objects after they are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器是比其他参数更有效，因为提供程序将其应用时该 cmdlet 将获取这些对象，而不是具有 Windows PowerShell 在检索之后筛选的对象。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet will copy items that cannot otherwise be changed, such as copying over a read-only file or alias.
trans-unit.target: 指示此 cmdlet 将复制不能更改，如复制只读文件或别名的项。

trans-unit.source: -FromSession
trans-unit.target: -FromSession

trans-unit.source: Specifies the **PSSession** object from which a remote file is being copied.
trans-unit.target: 指定 **PSSession** 对象从其复制远程文件。

trans-unit.source: When you use this parameter, the *Path* and *LiteralPath* parameters refer to the local path on the remote machine.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用此参数， *路径* 和 *LiteralPath* 参数引用远程计算机上的本地路径。

trans-unit.source: -Include
trans-unit.target: -Include

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, only those items upon which the cmdlet will act, excluding all others.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个字符串数组，指定只会依据该 cmdlet 将执行操作，排除其他所有项。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies a path to the item.
trans-unit.target: 指定项的路径。

trans-unit.source: The value of the *LiteralPath* parameter is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 值 *LiteralPath* 完全按照其键入使用参数。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 不会将任何字符解释为通配符。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径包括转义符，请将其括在单引号中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 单引号会告知 Windows PowerShell 不要将所有字符都解释为转义序列。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Returns an object representing the item with which you are working.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个代表你所处理的项目的对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此 cmdlet 将不产生任何输出。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, the path to the items to copy.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个字符串数组，指定要复制的项的路径。

trans-unit.source: -Recurse
trans-unit.target: -Recurse

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet performs a recursive copy.
trans-unit.target: 指示此 cmdlet 执行递归复制。

trans-unit.source: -ToSession
trans-unit.target: -ToSession

trans-unit.source: Specifies the **PSSession** object to which a remote file is being copied.
trans-unit.target: 指定 **PSSession** 对象传递给该复制远程文件。

trans-unit.source: When you use this parameter, the *Path* and *LiteralPath* parameters refer to the local path on the remote machine.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用此参数， *路径* 和 *LiteralPath* 参数引用远程计算机上的本地路径。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在活动事务中使用该命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，此参数才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅包括在活动事务中的命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，此参数才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题后面的

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 未运行。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a string that contains a path to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过管道传递一个字符串，包含此 cmdlet 的路径。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None or an object representing the copied item.
trans-unit.target: 无或表示复制的项的对象。

trans-unit.source: When you use the *PassThru* parameter, this cmdlet returns an object that represents the copied item.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用 *PassThru* 参数，此 cmdlet 将返回一个对象，表示复制的项。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is similar to the cp or copy commands in other shells.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 是类似于其他外壳中的 cp 或复制命令。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 旨在处理由任何提供程序公开的数据。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers available in your session, type `Get-PsProvider`.
trans-unit.target: 若要列出会话中可用的提供程序，请键入 `Get-PsProvider`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.target: Clear-Item

trans-unit.target: Get-Item

trans-unit.target: Invoke-Item

trans-unit.target: Move-Item

trans-unit.source: New-Item
trans-unit.target: New-Item

trans-unit.source: Remove-Item
trans-unit.target: Remove-Item

trans-unit.source: Rename-Item
trans-unit.target: Rename-Item

trans-unit.source: Set-Item
trans-unit.target: Set-Item

trans-unit.source: Get-PSProvider
trans-unit.target: Get-psprovider
